0.title: [stationName] Annual Average Precipitation
0.caption: Average annual precipitation. The lowest (min) and highest (max) precipitation of the month.

1.title: [stationName] Annual Average Precipitation Difference from Baseline
1.subTitle: Difference between yearly average and average for [baseline]
1.caption: Difference between the yearly average precipitation and the average precipitation for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.

2.title: [stationName] Wettest [unit] of the year
2.caption: The wettest [unit] of the year (total precipitation in mm).

extreme.name: wettest [interval] of the year (total precipitation in mm)
